original_text: This is what the Almighty Lord says: People are saying to you, Israel's land, ‘You destroy people. You take away the nation's children.’
korean_text: 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 그들이 너희에게 이르기를 너는 사람을 삼키는 자요 네 나라 백성을 제거한 자라 하거니와

sentences.original_text: This is what the Almighty Lord says:
People are saying to you, Israel's land,
You take away the nation's children.'
